tasks.label: Release • Version Bump (auto)
tasks.detail: Runs standard-version with default rules, based on commit messages

tasks.label: Release • Nightly Pre-release
tasks.command: npx standard-version --prerelease nightly && git push origin nightly --follow-tags
tasks.detail: Creates a nightly version (e.g., 3.6.1-nightly.0), updates changelog, and pushes to nightly branch

tasks.label: Release • Choose Stable Bump
tasks.detail: Interactively chooses patch/minor/major and generates changelog

tasks.label: Release • Stable After Merge (minor)
tasks.detail: Bumps minor version (e.g., 3.6.0 → 3.7.0) and pushes to main after merge

tasks.label: Release • Patch on Main (direct fix)
tasks.detail: For hotfixes directly on main — bumps patch and pushes with tags
